Question
========

Of 7 subjects, before and after a given effort of force, the heart rate is measured. We want to test whether the average heart rate before and after the effort is equal. Of the 7 differences between pre- and post-measurement the mean is 18 and the standard deviation is 39. The value of the test size of the paired T test is then

Answerlist
----------

* 1.08
* 1.22
* 1.38
* 3.82

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1.08: Incorrect
* 1.22: Correct
* 1.38: Incorrect
* 3.82: Incorrect
